metadata.title: CVE-2019-3878 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in mod_auth_mellon before v0.14.2. If Apache isconfigured as a reverse proxy and mod_auth_mellon is configured to only letthrough authenticated users (with the require valid-user directive), addingspecial HTTP headers that are normally used to start the special SAML ECP(non-browser based) can be used to bypass authentication.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
